name: Ftpquota File
summary: Learn about .FTPQUOTA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: FTPQUOTA files are often created by cPanel open source Web hosting software, which includes ProFTPD and the mod_quotatab add-on. When creating a user account, cPanel generates a ~/​public_ftp/​ directory that contains the file .ftpquota. This configuration file is used by the FTP software to moderate uploads and downloads.
